desc: Harvest Day is a mission-driven business with the belief in putting small sustainable food producers back at the heart of our food system. We want to create transparency around the food we eat. Weekly deliveries of locally sourced, naturally grown produce, direct from small scale farms in your community.

layout.text: Direct from Irish Farmers and Local Producers
Deliveries of locally sourced, organic and naturally grown produce, direct from small-scale, sustainable Irish farmers and producers.
